s-1.ptxt: TABLE OF BOLT, SCREW AND NUT

s2.ptxt: All bolts, screws, nuts and clips relevant to installing and removing the instrument panel are shown along with their alphabetical code in the table.

atten3.ptxt: After turning the ignition switch off, waiting time may be required before disconnecting the cable from the battery terminal. Therefore, make sure to read the disconnecting the cable from the battery terminal notice before proceeding with work (See page ).

s-1.ptxt: DISCONNECT CABLE FROM NEGATIVE BATTERY TERMINAL (w/ Airbag System)

atten2.ptxt: Wait at least 90 seconds after disconnecting the cable from the negative (-) battery terminal to disable the SRS system.

atten3.ptxt: When disconnecting the cable, some systems need to be initialized after the cable is reconnected (See page ).

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE LOWER INSTRUMENT CLUSTER FINISH PANEL

s2.ptxt: Detach the 7 claws and remove the lower instrument cluster finish panel.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE NO. 1 INSTRUMENT CLUSTER FINISH PANEL

s2.ptxt: Remove the clip <B>.
Detach the 9 claws and remove the No. 1 instrument cluster finish panel.
w/ Light Control Rheostat:
Disconnect the connector.
Remove the 3 screws.
Disconnect the connectors, detach the clamp and remove the combination meter.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE CENTER LOWER INSTRUMENT CLUSTER FINISH PANEL

s2.ptxt: Put protective tape around the center lower instrument cluster finish panel.
Using a moulding remover, detach the 3 claws and 2 clips and remove the center lower instrument cluster finish panel.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE CENTER INSTRUMENT CLUSTER FINISH PANEL ASSEMBLY

s2.ptxt: for Manual Air Conditioning System:

s3.ptxt: Detach the 4 claws and disconnect the air conditioning control.
Disconnect the connectors and remove the center instrument cluster finish panel.

s2.ptxt: for Automatic Air Conditioning System:

s3.ptxt: Disconnect the connectors and remove the center instrument cluster finish panel.

s2.ptxt: Detach the 6 claws and remove the instrument panel finish plate.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE LOWER FRONT PILLAR GARNISH LH

s2.ptxt: Put protective tape around the lower front pillar garnish.
Using a screwdriver, detach the 3 claws and 3 guides and remove the lower front pillar garnish.

atten4.ptxt: Tape the screwdriver tip before use.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE LOWER FRONT PILLAR GARNISH RH

atten4.ptxt: Use the same procedure described for the LH side.

s2.ptxt: Remove the part of the front door opening trim attached to the front pillar garnish.
Detach the 3 clips and remove the front pillar garnish.

atten4.ptxt: Use the same procedure described for the LH side.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE INSTRUMENT PANEL PASSENGER AIRBAG ASSEMBLY (w/ Front Passenger Airbag)

s2.ptxt: Disconnect the connector.

atten3.ptxt: When handling the airbag connector, take care not to damage the airbag wire harness.

s2.ptxt: Remove the 2 bolts
Detach the clamp.
Detach the 12 claws and remove the instrument panel passenger airbag.
Put protective tape around the upper instrument panel.
Remove the 4 screws <A>.
Using a moulding remover, detach the 6 claws and 5 guides and remove the upper instrument panel.
for Automatic Air Conditioning System:
Disconnect the connector.
